name: Aerodynamic Edge
description: The shield gains the Thrown (20/60) and Returning properties.

name: Shield Sconce
description: A torch or lantern can be attached to the shield.

name: Shield Sling
description: With a sling attached, the time it takes to don/doff a shield is reduced to an object interaction instead of an action.

name: Shield Spikes
description: When attacking with the shield, you can choose to deal piercing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

name: Razor Edge
description: When attacking with the shield, you can choose to deal slashing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

name: Sawback
description: The weapon has serrated teeth along the spine. It can be used as a saw.

name: Serrated Edge
description: The weapon's edge is jagged and serrated.  When attacking with it, you score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.
